Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "NCS is the NIP Communication/Control system. It is used to manipulate or retrieve information from all nippers in the world simultaneously."

"+ncs status\\r\\n Display a table with general information about all active nippers in the world.\\r\\n\\r\\n+ncs where\\r\\n Display a +people-style list for the nippers.\\r\\n\\r\\n+ncs update\\r\\n Perform a global NIP system update."
